title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2968/95 of 19 December 1995 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 1996 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2968/95 of 19 December 1995 fixing the amount of the carry-over  aid for certain fishery products for the 1996 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1996 fishing year, the carry-over aid for the products listed  in Annex I A, D and E to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92  (3) shall be as indicated in the  Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1995.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
ANNEX
1. Amount of the carry-over aid for products listed in Annex I (A) and (D)  and for sole (Solea spp.) listed in Annex I (E) to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92
>TABLE>
2. Amount of the carry-over aid for products listed in Annex I (E) to Regulation  (EEC) No 3759/92
>TABLE>
